text.div:
This case-sensitive code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/neuro-participation-consent defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
1 I consent to continue my participation in this study.
2 I DO NOT consent to continue my participation in this study but consent to keep the data collected up to this time

name: NeuroParticipationConsent
title: Questionnaire codes for neuro consent
description: The codes required for neuro consent

concept.display: I consent to continue my participation in this study.
I DO NOT consent to continue my participation in this study but consent to keep the data collected up to this time
